availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac P. Washburn (Daviess County, Kentucky, soldier and editor)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, soldier and editor. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza J. Washburn. Second lieutenant in the 4th Kentucky Infantry Regiment during the Mexican-American War. Editor of the Owensboro Democrat in Owensboro in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District No. 2 Town of Owensboro, p. 130; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Daviess County, Owensboro Ward 2, p. 43; History of Daviess County, Kentucky (Chicago: Inter-state Publishing Co., 1883), 198; Index to Compiled service Records of Volunteer Soldiers who Served During the Mexican War, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M616, Roll 0039.
